mapper.select: select cp.id as cpid,cp.route as cproute,cp.parent_id as cpparent_id from cms_user_role cur,cms_role_privilege crp,cms_privilege cp where cur.rold_id=crp.rold_id and crp.privilege_id= cp.id and cur.user_id=#{userId}

select cp1.id as cpid,cp1.name as cpname,cp1.description as cpdescription, cp1.route as cproute,cp1.type as cptype,cp1.icon as cpicon ,cp2.* from cms_privilege cp1,cms_privilege cp2 where cp1.id=cp2.parent_id

select cp1.name as cpname,cp1.description as cpdescription, cp1.route as cproute,cp1.type as cptype,cp1.icon as cpicon ,cp2.* from cms_privilege cp1,cms_privilege cp2,cms_role_privilege crp where cp1.id=cp2.parent_id and crp.privilege_id=cp1.id and crp.rold_id=#{id}
